review: The Fire TV stick has transformed the way I watch TV.  60% of all television now comes through the Fire TV stick.  This is a huge upgrade over the Apple TV I had a few years back.  Super fast processor allows you to rapidly browse and jump around to different apps and features.

review: Love this item! When I got it I couldn't wait to hook it up. Makes viewing my Amazon Prime and Netflix so easy. Way less effort to control compared to the Smart TV features on my Samsung. I also love the portability. I'll be taking this when I travel and hooking up at my hotel.
author: PAMELA L. SMITH

review: I had the Google Chrome version, but it will not plan Amazon instant video so I got this.  Very easy to setup and get going.  The wifi on it appears a bit better then the other one also.
author: Scott

review: Before my son got me the FireStick about a month ago I did not take advantage of my Prime membership like I wanted to because of the inconvenience of dragging my laptop in and hooking up to my computer every time I wanted to watch something.  Now that I don't have to do that I am watching more movies and taking advantage of more of the benefits, such as listening to all the music available to me.  I love it. I no longer have cable so this works out perfectly for me as it works with Sling TV, HuluPlus, etc. I also love the beautiful background scenery. Possibilities seem endless.
